readable.title: 2774362575_7543b8bf19
readable.content: A black and brown dog rests head on lower steps of stairs . A black and brown dog rests on a blue couch . A black dog looks up with his head on a blue carpeted step . A black dog stretches his back on the first step of a staircase . The rottweiller is laying with its head and paws on the first step of the green carpeted stair .
